… actually get in the bathroom. I'm traveling with my professional driver husband and our toddler son so we try and shower together when we can for safety reasons and so we can help each other with my son. We don't expect every place to …

… sure you're taken care of no matter what the reason is you're there. Even the shower maintenance guy went out of his way to thank us for coming and wished us a good day. We've been here for 3 days and noticed the staff do not sit around …

showerReviews.reviewText: An OK spot. Water pressure in the shower was great. …
No wait for shower, hot, good food, and great views. Good experience for me!

This place is a joke I paid $17 for a shower that was interrupted by staff knocking on the door every 2 minutes then accused of shop lifting a $8.00 cord after 3 staff members followed me all over the store I emptied my pockets proving them …

… I have also used the showers here, and the were very clean and fully supplied with freshly cleaned towels, shampoo, basically everything you'd need.  They were a little expensive at $14 for a shower, but they will let couples share one …
I stop to have a hot meal at Country Pride restaurant and shower. To find out the restaurant was closed and the shower were broken and Bathrooms were a dumb. …

Showers were amazing!  Hot water and awesome water pressure.   After our amazing shower we ate at the Country Pride.  I wasn't that excited, because I've eaten at plenty of Country Pride restaurants, but I must say this was by far the best! …

… service. They have several choices in restaurants. Nicely remodeled. Clean showers, very spacious bathroom and shower. My only dislike was the showers were a little more expensive, probably due to the remodel. Overall, great TA. I look …

… since I  was behind the wheel of a semi, now I'm retired, and I  use them as a place to eat, shower, and rest as I  travel the usa exploring this beautiful country.this particular TA truck stop is very exceptional as far as good …

All I can say is, this is the best shower ever!
Hot water and the pressure!
My goodness!
Whoever built this..
Thank you!
The shower's are the bomb constant hot water, clean and wonderful employees love this TA

showerReviews.reviewText: … Laundry and shower facilities are available. A small dog park is located on the property. …

The most friendly people we have met, so friendly that they paid for our shower…The shower and restroom is AAA clean. I have OCD and when I say clean.. I was amazed!!!  We want to thank the male cashier in the back for being so nice and …
I only use loves as a trucker.. cause the showers are always clean.. Mad this ones showers are out of order (7/29/25). If you stopping on your reset and need a shower keep pushing to the next one.

Employee said he clean the shower. Clearly by the video he Don't. I advise the manager she said he did. I showed her the video she stated my video wasn't important and didn't care. She would look at their video. Poor manager skills dirty …

One of the nicest loves in the country. Rolled in at 2100 Monday night and there were 50 spots to choose from. Brand new. Shower was perfect. Wendy's and subway. This will be the place I stop anytime I'm in the area.

I've never been so impressed with Loves truck stop. I went in for a much needed shower tired confused and Coby went out of his way to help me. We definitely need more Cobys. I'm so  grateful. This Loves truck stop is so clean and well …

showerReviews.reviewText: Here do not come!! Jun29/2025, 6:00 am, the woman with white hair start yelling me loud that even if I have a shower she will cancel from the system so I can not take a shower. The disagreement was becouse she told me no pets. My pet is …

Very nice staff.  Stopped for a shower during a road trip.  The shower isn't new but it's clean.   I tried to buy a cup of coffee after buying the shower and the gent gave me the coffee gratis.  Really nice.  Recommend.
Allowing parking in the fueling lines is unacceptable!!! You get your fuel and you move forward. You don't go inside and eat a meal or take a shower while others are waiting to get fuel!!!
Staff was nice, but, as a truck driver that likes to shower.. the water pressure was really bad and water was barely warm. And only 2 other showers were in use..
Clean shower, hot water and they are generous with towels.  They even have a hair dryer. All the staff were extremely friendly and helpful.
Friendly staff make this place great. The shower was clean the water hot and the jet powerful. $14 and well worth it.
Excellent folk's. Very helpful. Shower were cleaned up immediately for the next person to use. Place is exceptionally clean inside and out.
Real hard to get that machine to print a shower voucher

showerReviews.reviewText: … Shower curtain was old and moldy. …
Plenty of parking. Free shower with fuel purchase of 60 ga. Ample parking at all hours. This location is more like a grocery store with fuel service. It's not bad. Check em out.

Bathrooms and showers are in need of some TLC. The sink in shower 2 is completely broken. 2 out of the 4 stalls in the womens restroom are broken. Gas is cheap though and the groceries are very cheap too. They sell liquor.

showerReviews.reviewText: … at the petros and TA so I expect good service NOT EXCUSES like I got here in Demming, NM . I needed towels in my shower and can't find anyone so I go to the front an ask the puffy lipped women for one an she told me she can't do anything …

… gave me cold food and then charged 25 bucks. I didn't even freaking eat it because it was so bad after paying 600 bucks for a tank of fuel. The lady said that she couldn't give me a shower cuz I wasn't an ultra one member place is garbage

What's WRONG with all perros and TA'S? they all SUCKS,  no shower. Because always a excuse of not water, no AC on so many truck stops, (only coolers) customer service SUCKS. People looks like they were FORCE to work there,  0 friendly must …

… The theater room is basically a room with 4 or 5 cheap chairs that are only comfortable for about 15 minutes. But what really brings the rating down is the showers. Whatever they use to clean the floor leaves a deathly slippery residue. Af …

… up gas, it's so clean and tidy, the restroom is really nice and clean, a lot of souvenirs, snacks, some tools, washer and dryer shower and this is the first time that I found a small theater room, the staff is very friendly and helpful.

Extremely clean inside, in every part (main store, in the Iron Skillet and Starbucks, the bathroom and the shower I used). Friendly staff all around. Good selection of items you may need while traveling. The shower had nice, hot water. Only …

Another disappointing adventure, it's been 2 hours waiting for a shower and still no shower. While I was waiting I went to the restaurant to eat dinner. Got chicken fried steak with brown gravy and broccoli. I don't know what kinda gravy …

… with this place is not good. Used to be one favorite truckstop of ours but you don’t deserve owner/operators business anymore. After fueling 200 gallons of diesel we did NOT get a shower.  This was the last time we got fuel at your place. …

Nice place with lots of truck parking. Showers look nice but shower heads need to be replaced. Also water pressure kinda low. The tall skinny guy is great at keeping the men’s restrooms and showers clean tho. Props to him 👍🏽. Staff is …

… time there flies everywhere!! didn't get another sweet tea till i was almost done with everything!!! Ok then I head to shower got right in.shower was clean for sure. The the only bad thang was the service!!! Thank you for listening to …

locations.content: Traveling Tiger Center - Texas 87 Truck Stop and Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: We came here via Harvest Host. Place is extremely noisy with truckers and the highway. A shower is 12,5 dollar ,but free is you get 56 gallons of fuel, which is impossible in a motorhome. Shower were 3rd class.
Shower $8.50 clean. Restaurant is a little slow but great breakfast and tasted like a home cooked meal.

… stocked back up with products. The bathrooms have been remodeled. The showers are old to be sure, but they were clean and just what was needed after a few days in the truck. Every employee was friendly. Was sincerely thanked for my diesel …

… shape compared to others. Fuel runs slow but a great price. Food is made to order and free coffee that's tastes and hot along with a free shower with fuel purchase. Shower is older style and the towels are thick and clean and smell great.

… No def at pumps. Store does not have much to offer. Big parking lot so good to stop and find a spot but thats about all its good for. I hear they do have a cheap shower but never used it. They do have a resturant i eat there once it was ok.

… around property. Restaurant is not open for some reason. Mens bathroom unavailable so they told my husband he could use the shower bathroom but #1 didn't work either. Shelves out and low of pretty much everything. The women's bathroom …

Nice quiet and big dirt parking lot, ok restaurant not too pricey and plenty of entertainment pool table,  TV, pingpong table,  cheap shower. One of my favorite truck stops don't expect nothing fancy.
Used to stop here on the way back from Phoenix. Place fills up around 7 for us truckers. Great food. Shower is decent better than nothing.
Plenty of truck parking. A bit outdated in fuel island area. Nice homestyle SW diner on site, great food. Facilities such as shower and bathroom need attention.
Good food good shower oldie but a goodie exception roadys rewards

showerReviews.reviewText: Pretty big truck parking area. The usual snacks and sodas. Friendly staff. The showers could use an update. They are outdated, but that's not the fault of the employees. The shower I had wasn't cleaned very well. Hair and dirt all over the …

Fuel pump buttons worn out don't work.
Forced to go inside or use app which wasn't working.  Finally fueled parked came in for shower no hot water in shower.  Said screw it I'm going across street to Loves.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Jon David J D Ritter_Fuel_pump_buttons_worn_out_don't_work._Forced_to_g_7 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: I have showered here 3 times in the last week, in shower 6, 11, and 2. With shower 11 the only one having hot water without having to repeatedly flushing the toilet to rob the cold water at least in 6 the toilet would stick and you could do …
Needs remodeling like all the old FJs. As is becoming the PFJ standard, no hot water in shower; briefly warm at best.
The place is a dump. Shower is filthy, laundry is filthy. Towels are stinky. The staff has attitude and lazy apparently based on the disgusting and sorry state of the whole establishment!

Shower kept going from ice cold to scalding hot every few seconds. Sometimes warm with scalding hot with every toilet flush. Showers and restrooms need remodeling and a full time janitor. Staff was friendly at the time I visited.

Showers were honestly disgusting, clots of hair everywhere from the wall, to the floor, drain.  Walls were covered in slime. Requested a new shower, which wasn't a problem but they blamed "poor draining" on why there is hair everywhere. Us …

When will a pilot begin to value his clients? It has deteriorated terribly lately, I stopped to take a shower after work, at first the water came out hot, then it came out cold, I had to wash the shampoo off my head with cold water, I have …
If you're looking for a hot shower, go somewhere else. Water gets slightly lukewarm at best and the water pressure is a little more than a trickle. Worst shower experience by far!

… should be fired.  The floors look like they haven't been scrubbed & cleaned in years.  Shower 2 had a big long clod of black hair in the shower drain and in the sink, on the shower wall at face level, and all over the floor.  It was on my …
